post.description:
Find items that are significantly discounted compared to their regional average prices. Search for deals based on:

- Minimum discount percentage
- Minimum median price threshold
- Minimum sales volume
- Maximum purchase price

Results show both NQ and HQ variants with their respective discount percentages, making it easy to spot good buying opportunities.

Compare item prices across multiple worlds to find the best server to sell on. Used for the [world comparison page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/queries/world-comparison) to help players with alts on multiple servers find the most profitable world to sell their items.

Analyze your server's market economy with a heatmap visualization showing the best-selling items. View different metrics like total revenue, price changes, sales volume and more. Used for the [marketshare overview page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/ffxiv/marketshare/queries) to help identify profitable items to sell. For more info see the wiki [here](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/How-to-trade-using-our-FFXIV-Market-Overview).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

Retrieves detailed market statistics for specified items, including:

- Normal and High-Quality price metrics (median, average)
- Sales volume data (total gil amount, quantity sold)
- Item categorization (main/sub categories)
- Last update timestamp

Each item's data is split between NQ and HQ variants, providing comprehensive market performance metrics.

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Data is updated once per day - frequent polling is not recommended as values will not change more than once every 24 hours.

View historical sale data from region wide sales for items over the past 7 days using up to 10000 sales if any items sell that much region wide in one week. Analyze history at [item history page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/queries/item-history).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

View historical sale data from region wide sales for items over the past 7 days using up to 10000 sales if any items sell that much region wide in one week. Analyze history at [item history page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/queries/item-history).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

View current market board listings across servers and competition metrics on aveage posting time and undercut amounts. Browse listings at [listings page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/queries/listings).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

Copy and paste data from your [Allagan Tools](https://github.com/Critical-Impact/InventoryTools) plugin here on our [Allagan Data page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/allagan-data), shows your undercuts, sales, and valuable items sitting in your inventory you may have forgotten about and should sell. [See overall guide here](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Allagan-Tools-Inventory-Analysis). Import your data at [allagan data page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/allagan-data).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

Monitor specific items for price changes and receive alerts. Generate data for this at our [price sniper page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/price-sniper). Used for our [discord bot price alerts.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Price-Sniper-and-Item-Price-Alerts).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

Monitor specific items for quantity changes and receive alerts. Generate data for this at our [price sniper page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/price-sniper). Used for our [discord bot price alerts.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Price-Sniper-and-Item-Price-Alerts).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.
This finds the best items to buy on other servers or from vendors and sell on your home server. Used to make the [reselling search page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/queries/recommended).

Track when your items sell on the market board. You can generate data for this from the [Allagan Tools import](https://saddlebagexchange.com/allagan-data) or [undercut alerts page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/undercut). For more info see the wiki [here](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Allagan-Tools-Inventory-Analysis).

Track items you've purchased recently. Used for the [self purchase page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/ffxiv/self-purchase). Note items may be missing from this list as we only have the last 40 sales of any item in our database.

Track when other players undercut your market board listings. You can generate data for this at [undercut alerts page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/undercut). Used for the undercut alerts on the discord bot.For more info view our guides:
- [üîó FFXIV Discord Undercut Alerts](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Undercut-Alerts---Alpha-version)
- [üîó Changes to old Undercut and Sale alerts due to `seller_id` values](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Changes-to-%60seller_id%60-impacting-sale-and-undercut-alerts)
- [üîó What to do if your FFXIV undercut alerts are incorrect?](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/What-to-do-if-your-FFXIV-Undercut-Alerts-are-incorrect%3F)
- [üîó FFXIV Advanced Undercut Alert Options](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/FFXIV-Advanced-Undercut-Alert-Options).

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.

Calculate the most profitable items to craft based on material costs and market conditions. Compare different cost metrics (regional median, minimum listing price) and revenue options to find profitable crafting opportunities. Used for the [crafting profit simulator page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/ffxiv/craftsim/queries) to help crafters identify profitable recipes. For more info see the [crafting guide](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/How-to-use-the-FFXIV-crafting-profit-simulator-(craftsim)) or check out the youtube tutorial [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6wyHmxMr6Y8).

Create shopping lists for crafting materials to find the best servers to buy them on. Used for the [shopping list page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/ffxiv/shopping-list). Can search for up to 10 items at a time.

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.
Retrieves the official item description text from XIVAPI for a given item ID.
Calculate the most profitable items to purchase with scrips to get the most gil per scrip. Use to make the [scrip exchange page](https://saddlebagexchange.com/ffxiv/scrip-exchange).
This endpoint fetches you seller id using the retainer name, item its selling and server its on.

View current market board listings across servers and competition metrics on average posting time and undercut amounts. Enhanced version of the listings endpoint with additional metrics and improved performance.

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This endpoint makes direct calls to the Universalis API. Please be mindful of rate limits and avoid excessive requests to prevent overloading their services.
Predicts potential market shortages based on historical data and market trends. Helps identify items that may become scarce in the near future, allowing traders to prepare inventory accordingly.

Calculates weekly price change percentages for custom groups of FFXIV items in groups over a given date range. Each price group can target explicit item IDs and/or category filters and is aggregated separately.

Analyzes auction house data to find items with good profit potential based on TSM average prices, sale rate, and other metrics. 

[üìä View Best Deals Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/best-deals/recommended)

Finds commodities you can buy out and flip for a profit.

[üí∞ View Commodity Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/shortages/commodities)

Predicts future commodity shortages based on historical data and market trends. 

[üìà View Shortage Predictor](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/shortage-predictor) 

[üìñ Read Commodity Trading Guide](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/A-Crafters-Guide-for-using-%22Commodity-Shortage-Futures%22)

Finds the best realms to sell your items on based on population and market prices. 

[üí∞ View Export Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/export-search)
Find the best items to buy on other realms and import to your home realm.
Retrieves detailed item information including names, categories, required levels, base item levels, and other metadata for specified WoW items.
Retrieves item names for given item IDs. Can optionally include battle pets and return additional item metadata.

Returns names, IDs, and market statistics for all marketable items in World of Warcraft. Optionally includes battle pets. Used for [Mega Item Names page](https://temp.saddlebagexchange.com/megaitemnames).

Get detailed market statistics for items on single markets or commodities in the current expansion. 

[üìä Market Overview](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/marketshare/recommended)

Find what legacy items make the most gold, for items before Dragonflight. 

[üìà Legacy Market Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/legacy-marketshare)

Get current auction house listings for a specific item. Shows price and quantity for all current listings. 

[üìä View Item Data Example](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/item-data/190320)

Get current auction house listings for a specific item. Shows price and quantity for all current listings. 

[üìä View Item Data Example](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/item-data/190320)

Find items that are currently not listed on multiple realms across the auction house. 

[üè∑Ô∏è View Out of Stock Items](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/out-of-stock)
See what wow patch version and expansion any marketable items were added to the game.

Find what battle pets make the most gold. 

[üêæ Pet Market Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/pet-marketshare)

Get current market prices for items. 

[‚ö° Price Sniper Guide](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-discord-price-sniper-and-spike-alerts) 

[ü§ñ Auction Assassin Tool](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/AzerothAuctionAssassin)

Get current quantity available for items. 

[‚ö° Price Sniper Guide](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-discord-price-sniper-and-spike-alerts) 

[ü§ñ Auction Assassin Tool](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/AzerothAuctionAssassin)

Checks for undercutting across an entire region.



[üåç Region Undercut Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/region-undercut)`/docs/` endpoint is for documentation purposes only.

`/api/wow/regionundercut` is the actual endpoint for this route.

Check the price of items across all realms in a region. 

Use the [ü§ñ Auction Assassin Tool](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/AzerothAuctionAssassin) instead of this api.

post.summary: WoW Server to Server Trade Scanner
post.description:
Finds profitable items to trade from one single realm to another. 

[üîç Full Scan Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/full-scan)

Shows the listings of any one item across all realms. 

[üõçÔ∏è Shopping List Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/shopping-list)

post.summary: WoW Single Item Market Shortage Finder
post.description:
Finds items on your home realms you can buy out and flip for a profit. 

[üìä Single Item Tool](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/shortages/single)

Retrieves TradeSkillMaster (TSM) market statistics for specified WoW items across multiple game editions. Returns market data like item names, average prices, sale rates, and more. Supports Retail, Classic, Wrath/Cata, Season of Discovery, and Anniversary. 

TSM is a popular WoW addon that tracks auction house data and provides market analysis tools for traders.

Retrieves TradeSkillMaster (TSM) market statistics using the newer V2 backend. Accepts the same parameters as `/api/wow/tsmstats`, but returns a more compact, pre-formatted dataset suitable for UI consumption.

Checks if your auctions have been undercut. 

[üìñ Discord Alert Guide](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-Discord-Undercut-Alerts) 

[üîå Download Addon](https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/saddlebag-exchange)

`/docs/` endpoint is for documentation purposes only.

`/api/wow/undercut` is the actual endpoint for this route.

post.summary: WoW Upload Times for Auction House Data
post.description:
Shows what minute of each hour blizzard updates the auction house api data used for all our tools. 

[‚è∞ View Upload Timers](https://saddlebagexchange.com/wow/upload-timers)
Find items where the quantity changes rapidly. Evidence of a big goblin in the auction house.
Find the best server to buy specific BOE raid drops based on item level and tertiary stats.s
Find the best server to sell your BOE raid drops based on item level and tertiary stats.s
Calculates weekly price change percentages for custom WoW price groups over a given date range. Each price group can target explicit item IDs and/or category filters and is aggregated separately.

homeRealmName.title: Homerealmname
homeRealmName.description: Home realm ID (numeric ID recommended for non-English clients)

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Minimum discount percentage. 70% means we look for an item that is 30k or less if the median is 100k.

medianPrice.title: Medianprice
medianPrice.description: Median price threshold. 50k means we look for an item that sells for 50k or more and ignores items that sell for less.

salesAmount.title: Salesamount
salesAmount.description: Minimum number of sales. 20 means we look for an item that sold at least 20 times in the last 7 days.

maxBuyPrice.title: Maxbuyprice
maxBuyPrice.description: Maximum buy price in gil. 20k means we look for an item that is 20k or less so you dont spend too much on an item.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description:
A list of category and subcategories to filter items for.
[Full list of categories can be found on our wiki.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Item-categories-ids-and-list)

item_id.title: Item Id
item_id.description: ID of the item for the blog, this is just the description from the xivapi

cost_metric.title: Cost Metric
cost_metric.description:
Cost metric to use in calculations, can be:
'material_avg_cost', 'material_median_cost' or 'material_min_listing_cost'

revenue_metric.title: Revenue Metric
revenue_metric.description:
Revenue metric to use in calculations, can be:
'revenue_avg', 'revenue_median', 'revenue_home_min_listing', 'revenue_region_min_listing'

sales_per_week.title: Sales Per Week
sales_per_week.description: Minimum sales per week to consider

filters.title: Filters
filters.description:
A list of category and subcategories to filter items for.
[Full list of categories can be found on our wiki.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Item-categories-ids-and-list)

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.description: List of Job IDs to scan recipies for ([0] for omnicrafter with all jobs), see [wiki](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/FFXIV-job-category-ids) for full list of job IDs.

stars.title: Stars
stars.description: Number of stars required (-1 for any)

export_servers.title: Export Servers
export_servers.description: List of servers with your other alts that you want to move items to.

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: List of item IDs for items you want to move, so you can easily compare prices across servers.

hq_only.title: Hq Only
hq_only.description: Ignores low-quality item prices if True

item_id.title: Item Id
item_id.description: ID of the item to fetch history for

item_type.title: Item Type
item_type.description: Type of item to retrieve history for; options: "hq_only", "nq_only", or "all"

end_days.title: End Days
end_days.description: (Deprecated) Stop searching at this many days in the past

initial_days.title: Initial Days
initial_days.description: (Deprecated) Start searching for sale data this many days in the past

item_id.title: Item Id
item_id.description: Item ID of the item to fetch listings info for

initial_days.title: Initial Days
initial_days.description: (Deprecated) The age limit of how old data can be, 7 means no data older than 7 days.

end_days.title: End Days
end_days.description: (Deprecated) The age limit of how new data can be, 1 means no data older than 1 days. 0 mean search until the current time.

time_period.title: Time Period
time_period.description:
Time period to search for sales in hours.
Ex: 168 is 7 days, 24 hours is 1 day

sales_amount.title: Sales Amount
sales_amount.description: Ignore items with less than this amount of sales in the chosen time period

average_price.title: Average Price
average_price.description: Dont show items below this average price

filters.title: Filters
filters.description:
A list of category and subcategories to filter items for.
[Full list of categories can be found on our wiki.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Item-categories-ids-and-list)

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description:
Field to sort results by. Valid options:
- avg: Average sale price
- marketValue: Current market value
- median: Median sale price
- purchaseAmount: Total number of purchases
- quantitySold: Total quantity of items sold
- percentChange: Percentage price change

dc_only.title: Dc Only
dc_only.description: Search only your data center if True

user_auctions.title: User Auctions
user_auctions.description: List of user auctions with desired prices and states

hq_only.title: Hq Only
hq_only.description: If True, include only HQ items when building this price group.

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: Explicit item IDs to include in this price group. At least one of `item_ids` or `categories` must be non-empty.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: FFXIV category filters. Positive values are main/sub categories, negative values are custom categories. See the wiki for full list of category IDs.

user_auctions.title: User Auctions
user_auctions.description: List of user auctions with desired quantities and states

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: List of item IDs (-1 for all items)

preferred_roi.title: Preferred Roi
preferred_roi.description: Preferred ROI percentage, ex: 25 means we want 2500 gil profit per item if the cost is 10000 gil

min_profit_amount.title: Min Profit Amount
min_profit_amount.description: Minimum profit amount in gil per item, ex: 10000 means we want at least 10000 gil profit per item, so if the cost is 10000 gil, we want at least 20000 gil profit

min_desired_avg_ppu.title: Min Desired Avg Ppu
min_desired_avg_ppu.description: Minimum desired average price per unit, ex: 10000 means show only items that on average sell for 10000 gil or more on your server

min_stack_size.title: Min Stack Size
min_stack_size.description: Minimum stack size to consider, ex: 2 or more means ignore one item posted for really low when you want to buy big stacks of commodities

hours_ago.title: Hours Ago
hours_ago.description: Time period in hours for sales data, ex: 168 means average and sale rates will be based on the past 7 days, 24 hours is 1 day, 48 is 3 days, etc.  Note sales stats max out at 40 sales due to our db limitations, actual sales might be higher than the number in the response.

min_sales.title: Min Sales
min_sales.description: Minimum number of sales in the time period selected for hours_ago, ex: 2 means show only items that sold at least 2 times in the past selected time period, so 7 sales for 168 hours means at least 1 sale per day.  Note sales stats max out at 40 sales due to our db limitations, actual sales might be higher than the number in the response.

hq.title: Hq
hq.description: Consider only high-quality items if True

home_server.title: Home Server
home_server.description: Name of your home server where you will sell items, sales stats are based on your server.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description:
A list of category and subcategories to filter items for.
[Full list of categories can be found on our wiki.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Item-categories-ids-and-list)

region_wide.title: Region Wide
region_wide.description: Search your Data Center if False, Search all Data Centers in your region if True.

include_vendor.title: Include Vendor
include_vendor.description: Include vendor item prices as if vendors were another server if True.

show_out_stock.title: Show Out Stock
show_out_stock.description: Show out-of-stock items if True, if false then only show items that are currently in stock on your server.

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: List of item IDs to monitor, when we no longer see your retainer name in an auction on these ids then we trigger an alert and update your data. Note this may trigger when you pull your retainers off the marketboard to update prices.

color.title: Color
color.description: Scrip color or category, can be: 'Orange Gatherers', 'Purple Gatherers', 'Purple Crafters', 'Orange Crafters'

item_id.title: Item Id
item_id.description: ID of the item to fetch seller data for

shopping_list.title: Shopping List
shopping_list.description: List of items you want to craft, with amount of crafts you want to make and HQ status

region_wide.title: Region Wide
region_wide.description: Consider region-wide data if True, only show the lowest price in your Datacenter if false

ignore_after_hours.title: Ignore After Hours
ignore_after_hours.description: Ignore listings that have not been updated in this many hours. Ex: 168 means ignore any data over 1 week old.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description:
A list of category and subcategories to filter items for.
[Full list of categories can be found on our wiki.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/Item-categories-ids-and-list)

hq_only.title: Hq Only
hq_only.description: Consider only high-quality items if True

desired_median_price.title: Desired Median Price
desired_median_price.description: Minimum median price threshold in gil. Only show items that typically sell above this amount.

desired_sales_per_week.title: Desired Sales Per Week
desired_sales_per_week.description: Minimum number of sales per week. Only show items that sell at least this many times per week.

desired_price_vs_median_percent.title: Desired Price Vs Median Percent
desired_price_vs_median_percent.description: Desired price vs median percentage. For example, 140 means show items where current prices are 40% higher than the median.

desired_quantity_vs_avg_percent.title: Desired Quantity Vs Avg Percent
desired_quantity_vs_avg_percent.description: Desired quantity vs average percentage. For example, 50 means show items where current quantity is 50% lower than average.

ignore_ids.title: Ignore Ids
ignore_ids.description:
List of item IDs to ignore and remove from results.
Set to -1 it will also scan universalis directly when also using add_ids.
For more information, see the [the advanced undercuts guide](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/FFXIV-Advanced-Undercut-Alert-Options)

add_ids.title: Add Ids
add_ids.description: List of item IDs to guarantee from results

hq_only.title: Hq Only
hq_only.description: Return data on items HQ only if True

ignore_data_after_hours.title: Ignore Data After Hours
ignore_data_after_hours.description: Ignore undercuts on items with very old data (in hours)

ignore_undercuts_with_quantity_over.title: Ignore Undercuts With Quantity Over
ignore_undercuts_with_quantity_over.description: Ignore undercuts with quantity over this value. To ignore big stacks if small stacks sell faster. On some items people may not buy big stacks and so undercuts can be ignored.

ignore_undercuts_with_quantity_under.title: Ignore Undercuts With Quantity Under
ignore_undercuts_with_quantity_under.description: Ignore undercuts with quantity under this value. To ignore small stacks or 1 if they undercut you but its not a big deal.

ignore_retainers.title: Ignore Retainers
ignore_retainers.description: List of retainers to ignore if there are constan undercutters you dont care about.

region.title: Region
region.description: FFXIV region to query. Must be one of: 'North-America', 'Europe', 'Oceania', 'Japan', or 'NA'.

start_year.title: Start Year
start_year.description: Year to start the weekly price group delta calculation.

start_day.title: Start Day
start_day.description: Day of month (1‚Äì31) to start the calculation.

end_year.title: End Year
end_year.description: Year to end the weekly price group delta calculation.

end_day.title: End Day
end_day.description: Day of month (1‚Äì31) to end the calculation.

price_groups.title: Price Groups
price_groups.description: List of price groups to aggregate. Each group can target explicit item IDs and/or category filters and will be processed independently.

price_setting.title: Price Setting
price_setting.description: Which price metric to use when aggregating. Must be 'average' or 'median'.

quantity_setting.title: Quantity Setting
quantity_setting.description: Which quantity metric to use when aggregating. Must be 'quantitySold' or 'salesAmount'.

minimum_marketshare.title: Minimum Marketshare
minimum_marketshare.description: Exclude items that never reach this marketshare in the selected date range. Higher values restrict to items with more impact on the market.

hq.title: Hq
hq.description: Select HQ True if you want to craft HQ items

job.title: Job
job.description: Job ID (0 for any), see [wiki](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/FFXIV-job-category-ids) for full list

itemID.title: Itemid
itemID.description: Item ID of your item (choose either this or petID)

petID.title: Petid
petID.description: Pet ID of your item (choose either this or itemID)

price.title: Price
price.description: Price of your item in copper

desired_state.title: Desired State
desired_state.description: Desired state when you want to be alerted ('above' or 'below' the set price)

hq.title: Hq
hq.description: High Quality only (True for HQ only, False for NQ or HQ)

desired_state.title: Desired State
desired_state.description: Desired state when you want to be alerted when the number of items listed is 'above' or 'below' the quantity set

hq.title: Hq
hq.description: High Quality only (True for HQ only, False for NQ or HQ)

populationWP.title: Populationwp
populationWP.description: Population according to WoWProgress, dont show realms with less players

populationBlizz.title: Populationblizz
populationBlizz.description: Min population according to Blizzard, dont show realms with less players

rankingWP.title: Rankingwp
rankingWP.description: Min ranking according to WoWProgress, more raid clears means more buyers for high end items

includeCategories.title: Includecategories
includeCategories.description: Categories to include, empty list [] for all. [See wiki for full list of categories.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

excludeCategories.title: Excludecategories
excludeCategories.description: Categories to exclude, empty list [] for all. [See wiki for full list of categories.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

expansionNumber.title: Expansionnumber
expansionNumber.description: Expansion number: 1 for classic, 2 for tbc, 3 for wotlk... 11 for The War Within

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of items to search from: "df", "pets", "legacy", "all"

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Discount percentage. Show items with a discount vs the tsm average. I.E. if tsm says 100 gold then it will show items listed for 10.

minPrice.title: Minprice
minPrice.description: Minimum average price, exclude items with lower average prices.

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item class (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclass (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

expansion_number.title: Expansion Number
expansion_number.description: Expansion number: 1 for classic, 2 for tbc, 3 for wotlk... 11 for The War Within

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Show only this item class. (-1 for all)[See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Show only this item subclass. (-1 for all)[See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

homeRealmName.title: Homerealmname
homeRealmName.description: Home realm ID (numeric ID recommended for non-English clients)

desired_price_increase.title: Desired Price Increase
desired_price_increase.description: How much higher in gold do you want to raise the price, ignores flips that cant be brought up higher than this.

flip_risk_limit.title: Flip Risk Limit
flip_risk_limit.description: Flip risk limit. How many times the tsm average do you want to flip the price above? I.E. if set to 3 and the tsm average is 100 gold then it will assume you can only sell for 300 gold, will ignore flips that can only yeild a profit on higher amounts.

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item class (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclass (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

region.title: Region
region.description: Region for the request (NA or EU)

itemID.title: Itemid
itemID.description: ID of the item to search

populationWP.title: Populationwp
populationWP.description: Population according to WoWProgress. i.e. 3000 means that 3000 people on a realm have uploaded to WoWProgress. Actual player population may be higher.

populationBlizz.title: Populationblizz
populationBlizz.description: Population according to Blizzard: 3 is Full, 2 is High, 1 is Medium, 0 is Low

minPrice.title: Minprice
minPrice.description: Ignore servers with a min price lower than this.

sortBy.title: Sortby
sortBy.description: Sort results by specified field from the response. (options: avgMinPrice, medianMinPrice, avgServerQuantity, medianServerQuantity, totalSelectedServerQuantity, avgTSMPrice, salesPerDay)

desiredStats.title: Desiredstats
desiredStats.description: List of desired tertiary stats to search for (e.g. Socket, Speed, Avoidance, Leech, etc.)(empty list for any stats)

populationWP.title: Populationwp
populationWP.description: Population according to WoWProgress. i.e. 3000 means that 3000 people on a realm have uploaded to WoWProgress.

populationBlizz.title: Populationblizz
populationBlizz.description: Population according to Blizzard: 3 is Full, 2 is High, 1 is Medium, 0 is Low

rankingWP.title: Rankingwp
rankingWP.description: Minimum realm ranking according to WoWProgress

maxPurchasePrice.title: Maxpurchaseprice
maxPurchasePrice.description: Maximum purchase price in gold to consider

desiredStats.title: Desiredstats
desiredStats.description: List of desired tertiary stats to search for (e.g. Socket, Speed, Avoidance, Leech, etc.)(empty list for any stats)

desiredMinIlvl.title: Desiredminilvl
desiredMinIlvl.description: Minimum item level to search for

maxPurchasePrice.title: Maxpurchaseprice
maxPurchasePrice.description: Maximum purchase price, exclude items more expensive than this.

sortBy.title: Sortby
sortBy.description: Sort by field (options: profitAmount, profitROI, salesPerDay, lowestPrice)

includeCategories.title: Includecategories
includeCategories.description: Categories to include, empty list [] for all. [See wiki for full list of categories.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

excludeCategories.title: Excludecategories
excludeCategories.description: Categories to exclude, empty list [] for all. [See wiki for full list of categories.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

connectedRealmIDs.title: Connectedrealmids
connectedRealmIDs.description: Connected realm IDs, if limiting to specific realms

ilvl.title: Ilvl
ilvl.description: Item level, will not show items with lower levels than 201.

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item classes, -1 for all. [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclasses, -1 for all. [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: List of item IDs to get data from, shows all items if sent an empty list

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: List of item IDs to get data from, shows all items if sent an empty list

return_all.title: Return All
return_all.description: Return items instead of items with pets overlapping classic items if True

pets.title: Pets
pets.description: Show battle pet data instead of items if True

use_db.title: Use Db
use_db.description: Use the database insead of static files in the api if True

commodity.title: Commodity
commodity.description: Show commodity data if True, show your home realm data if False

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter to just this item class. (-1 for all)[See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter to just this item subclass. (-1 for all)[See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

ilvl.title: Ilvl
ilvl.description: Filter to just this base item level

expansion_number.title: Expansion Number
expansion_number.description: Expansion number: 1 for classic, 2 for tbc, 3 for wotlk... 11 for The War Within

desired_avg_price.title: Desired Avg Price
desired_avg_price.description: Minimum desired average price in copper, exclude items with lower prices, 1000000 is 100 gold

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item class (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclass (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Sort by field (options: currentMarketValue, historicMarketValue, historicPrice, minPrice, percentChange, salesPerDay)

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: Discount percentage, will show averages of each item with a discount vs the tsm average. I.E. if set to 90 when tsm says 100 gold then it will return 10.

pets.title: Pets
pets.description: Show battle pet data instead of items if True

homeRealmName.title: Homerealmname
homeRealmName.description: Home realm ID (numeric ID recommended for non-English clients)

includeCategories.title: Includecategories
includeCategories.description: Categories to include, empty list [] for all. [See wiki for full list of categories.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

excludeCategories.title: Excludecategories
excludeCategories.description: Categories to exclude, empty list [] for all. [See wiki for full list of categories.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

sortBy.title: Sortby
sortBy.description: Sort by field (options: avgTSMPrice, estimatedRegionMarketValue, salesPerDay, percentChange, maxPrice, homeMinPrice)

homeRealmName.title: Homerealmname
homeRealmName.description: Home realm ID (numeric ID recommended for non-English clients)

name.title: Name
name.description: Human readable name for this price group, used as the key in the response. Max 64 characters, alphanumeric plus spaces, apostrophes, hyphens, underscores, periods, and commas.

item_ids.title: Item Ids
item_ids.description: Explicit WoW item IDs to include in this group. At least one of `item_ids` or `categories` must be non-empty.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Category filters describing item_class / item_subclass / expansion_number / min_quality combinations to include in this group.

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Item class filter (>= -1). See the wiki for a full list of class IDs. -1 means all classes.

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Item subclass filter (>= -1). If `item_class` is -1 then this must also be -1.

expansion_number.title: Expansion Number
expansion_number.description: Expansion number: 1 for Classic, 2 for TBC, 3 for WotLK ... 11 for The War Within. -1 is for all expansions.

min_quality.title: Min Quality
min_quality.description: Minimum item quality to include (between -1 and 3).

homeRealmName.title: Homerealmname
homeRealmName.description: Home realm ID (numeric ID recommended for non-English clients)

historicPrice.title: Historicprice
historicPrice.description: Minimum historic price threshold in gold

min_quantity_change_percent.title: Min Quantity Change Percent
min_quantity_change_percent.description: Minimum percentage change in quantity between snapshots to consider significant. I.E. if set to 70 then it will only show items that can change by 70 percent or more in a single hour.

min_quantity_swings.title: Min Quantity Swings
min_quantity_swings.description: Minimum number of significant quantity changes required. I.E. if set to 9 then it find items that change in quantity 9 times or more by the amount set in min_quantity_change_percent.

hours_to_analyze.title: Hours To Analyze
hours_to_analyze.description: Number of hours of data to analyze (168 = 1 week)

min_price_multiplier.title: Min Price Multiplier
min_price_multiplier.description: Minimum price multiplier for price spikes. I.E. if set to 5 then the max price is 25, 5x the average price.

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item class (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclass (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

expansion_number.title: Expansion Number
expansion_number.description: Expansion number: 1 for classic, 2 for tbc, 3 for wotlk... 11 for The War Within

region.title: Region
region.description: Region: NA or EU, this isnt used we just look att the addonData

homeRealmID.title: Homerealmid
homeRealmID.description: Home realm ID, this isnt used we just look att the addonData

homeRealmId.title: Homerealmid
homeRealmId.description: ID of the realm you will buy items from

newRealmId.title: Newrealmid
newRealmId.description: ID of the new realm, you will sell items on

min_historic_price.title: Min Historic Price
min_historic_price.description: Exclude items with average prices below this

desired_roi.title: Desired Roi
desired_roi.description: Minimum return on investment. ex: 25% means only show items that sell for 25 percent higher on the new realm than the old realm

sale_per_day.title: Sale Per Day
sale_per_day.description: Exclude items with sales per day lower than this

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item class (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclass (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

maxPurchasePrice.title: Maxpurchaseprice
maxPurchasePrice.description: Maximum purchase price in gold to show. Exclude items more expensive than this.

connectedRealmIDs.title: Connectedrealmids
connectedRealmIDs.description: Connected realm IDs, if limiting to specific realms

flip_risk_limit.title: Flip Risk Limit
flip_risk_limit.description: Flip risk limit. How many times the tsm average do you want to flip the price above? I.E. if set to 3 and the tsm average is 100 gold then it will assume you can only sell for 300 gold, will ignore flips that can only yeild a profit on higher amounts.

item_class.title: Item Class
item_class.description: Filter just this item class (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of classes.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

item_subclass.title: Item Subclass
item_subclass.description: Filter just this item subclass (-1 for all). [See wiki for full list of subclasses.](https://github.com/ff14-advanced-market-search/saddlebag-with-pockets/wiki/WoW-item-classes-and-subclasses)

pets.title: Pets
pets.description: Show pet data if True, otherwise show regularitem data.

game_edition.title: Game Edition
game_edition.description: Game edition (retail, classic, wrath, sod, anniversary)

homeRealmName.title: Homerealmname
homeRealmName.description: Home realm ID (numeric ID recommended for non-English clients, the name works for English clients only)

start_year.title: Start Year
start_year.description: Year to start the weekly price group delta calculation (>= 2022).

start_day.title: Start Day
start_day.description: Day of month (1‚Äì31) to start the calculation.

end_year.title: End Year
end_year.description: Year to end the weekly price group delta calculation. Defaults to 2100 to allow open-ended analysis windows.

end_month.title: End Month
end_month.description: Month (1‚Äì12) to end the calculation. Defaults to 1.

end_day.title: End Day
end_day.description: Day of month (1‚Äì31) to end the calculation. Defaults to 1.

price_groups.title: Price Groups
price_groups.description: List of price groups to aggregate. Each group can target explicit item IDs and/or category filters and will be processed independently.

short_term.title: Short Term
short_term.description: If True, use short-term mode: ignores the provided start/end dates and instead uses the last ~2 weeks of hourly quantity data plus daily TSM statistics. If False, uses weekly historical mode over the specified date range.
